3021.name: Unknown
3021.message:
An error has occurred.

If there is a disc in the console, press
the EJECT Button, remove the disc,
and clean it gently, using a soft cloth
to wipe outward from the center.

After that, turn off the Wii U console
and try again.

If the problem persists, please make
note of the error code, and then turn
off the console's power, unplug the
Wii U console's AC adapter from the
outlet, and visit support.nintendo.com.
